title: Why good score wont get me S?
body:
My score after end of the game was 29/0/9 and 220 crps and alsmot 20.000 golds. Got quite a few tripple kills and 1 Quadra but al i get is S-.
Seriously why?
what else u want me to do. I destroyed towers helped team even got honoured. This is not the first time even with xayah that happened twice i got S for 1/1/9 with her but didnt got S 24/3 with her. I dont get it pls help

replies.body: Basically what he's saying is, if you follow the meta, you're being compared by tons of people. The more people that do the same thing, the likelier it is that people are having great games with that setup. If you want to rank higher, you have to do better than so many people did before you. Break out of that meta, and you might find yourself ranking higher with what you consider to be a lower score, because you're being compared to a lot fewer people.

dollars to doughnuts your ward placement and vision score was lower in the s- vs the s game noted.

perform like that and keep using trink and control wards anywhere dark on the map and bam. can probably slide on the kills by a good dozen and still get a higher score doing that.

unless we are talking aram. and who the heck knows when it comes to aram anymore.

Those [**mastery scores**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284) are mostly calculated based on one key factor, how well you're doing with the champion in the role you're playing compared to everyone else who played the same champion in the same role. Essentially, those scores are a ranking of how well you did in that scenario compared to everyone else who was in the same position.
